articles.title: Many People Visit Youth Movement Museum
articles.content:
Many People Visit Youth Movement Museum
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- It has been two years since the Youth Movement Museum was built to mark the 70th founding anniversary of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League.
					 After the museum was opened to the public on Jan. 21, Juche 105 (2016), it has been visited by more than 300,000 servicepersons, working people of various strata and school youth and children from at least 4,100 units.
					
					 In its general review hall, the visitors laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il among youth and children, and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They went round the photos of the peerlessly great persons and historic data and relics on display at every room.
					
					 They hardened their will to strive for the future of a youth power.
					
					 The museum has been also visited by overseas compatriots and foreigners. They said that the DPRK's future is rosy for a huge army of youths.

articles.title: Effective Koryo Medicines
articles.content:
Effective Koryo Medicines
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- The pharmaceutical workteam of the Central Zoo in the DPRK is manufacturing Koryo medicines with effective ingredients extracted from animals.
					 The Koryo medicines are in great demand as they are helpful to the promotion of the people's health.
					
					 Bear's Gall Injection, Civet Uhwanghwan and Natural Muskrat Injection enjoy popularity at home and abroad for their good quality and efficacy.
					
					 Bear's Gall Liver Pill, made of bear's gall and extract from trunk of Maackia amurensis, is two times more effective than the pill made of only bear's gall.
					
					 Civet Uhwanghwan, made of cattle's horn and civet, is used as antidote or sedative.
					
					 Tiger Bone Liquor and Bear Bone Liquor are very efficient for stopping to pain and the treatment of neuralgia and rheumatoid arthritis.
					
					 Researcher Kwon O Song told KCNA that the workteam is concentrating efforts on developing new Koryo medicines suited to the world trend of medicines development.

articles.title: New Organic Growth Activator Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Organic Growth Activator Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- New organic growth activator "Kirim" is favored in the fields of agriculture and forest of the DPRK.
					 The activator, based on the microbe-technology, electric and electronic technology and automatics technology, makes it possible to reinforce the root activity by sterilizing and suppressing the microbes harmful to crop growth and multiplying beneficial microbes and increase crop yields by enhancing photosynthesis and improving soil.
					
					 It is divided into organic agricultural production addictives, biological seed-covering material and organic stockbreeding addictives.
					
					 Advantages were proved at the Jiksol Cooperative Farm in Kim Hyong Gwon County, Namchang Cooperative Farm in Munchon City, Hwasong Cooperative Farm in Singye County and the Jungsan County Forestry Management Station last year.
					
					 The organic growth activator "Kirim" was registered as one of national patents.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bolstering Up Military Strength
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bolstering Up Military Strength
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Only when a country has a mighty military capability can it firmly defend its dignity, people's happiness and peace, Rodong Sinmun says in an article Friday.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 To bolster up the military strength is not a temporary work but a nation's everlasting top priority.
					
					 The arms of the service personnel equipped with no ideology, with no anti-imperialist class consciousness, are more useless than a stick. They would make a trouble.
					
					 Recorded in history are not a few events that such service members destroyed the gains of revolution achieved by the forerunners and made no scruple of aiming at the people in the struggle to defend their own social system.
					
					 The arms not relying on the self-supporting defense industry can not safeguard the nation's dignity, the people's happiness and peace to the last.
					
					 For a country to equip its forces with arms of so-called developed countries leads to military subordination.
					
					 Some countries known as regional powers and relatively rich countries failed to augment the military capability due to the sanctions of the U.S. and other imperialist powers.
					
					 The main reason is that they met the demand for the weapons by purchasing them from other countries as they failed to firmly arm the service personnel with the anti-imperialist independent consciousness and had a weak self-supporting defense industry foundation.
					
					 It resulted in the imperialists' trampling on the sovereignty of those countries and turning them into war-torn ones.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will hold fast to the Workers' Party of Korea's new line of simultaneously developing the two fronts, put greater efforts to its implementation and thus further bolster up the military capability for self-defense.

articles.title: Minju Joson on U.S. Deployment of Troops
articles.content:
Minju Joson on U.S. Deployment of Troops
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the U.S. moved three B-2 Stealth bombers and about 200 troops from the air force base in Missouri State to the Anderson Air Force Base on Guam. It claims that the deployment of B-2 Stealth bombers on Guam is a "regular rotation deployment" and "short-term deployment".
					 Commenting on the fact, Minju Joson Friday brands such assertion as a childish wordplay to mislead the public opinion at home and abroad.
					
					 It is no secret that the U.S. has hurled huge naval and air forces in and around the Korean Peninsula from the outset of the year, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 What draws attention is that the U.S. moved even the forces from its mainland to the Peninsula and its vicinity.
					
					 The dense and intensive deployment of the U.S. troops in and around the Peninsula is part of its war gambling for a nuclear preemptive strike at the DPRK as well as military hegemony in the Asia-Pacific by dint of "force".
					
					 "Peace" on the lip-service of the U.S. is a farce to hide its nature of aggression.
					
					 Days have gone when the U.S. jeopardizes peace on the Peninsula and security of the region as it pleases, being assured that its mainland is far away from the hottest spot of the world.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the destiny of the U.S. which is so arrogant to say about "total destruction" and "extermination" of the sovereign state hinges on the decision of the DPRK, a nuclear power of Juche and world military power. It is stark reality.
					
					 The U.S. should lend an ear to the voices of the world that the DPRK-U.S. nuclear confrontation would come to a close on the land of the USA, and abandon its wild ambition for invasion of the DPRK. The pipedream will only precipitate its self-destruction.

articles.title: Americans Suffer from Nuclear-phobia
articles.content:
Americans Suffer from Nuclear-phobia
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Nuclear-phobia by the nuclear force of the DPRK has now caused a tragicomedy in the U.S. 
					 On January 16 a meteor fell from the sky between Ohio and Michigan with a great bang, brightening the sky.
					
					 This sparked off the explosive postage of stories about the "fireball in the nocturnal sky" on the U.S. internet websites.
					
					 Internet users admitted that they worried the meteor in question could have been a nuclear bomb flown from north Korea.
					
					 A twitter user posted words that when meteor brightened the sky between Ohio and Michigan, all internet network users hoped that it would be a meteor, not north Korea's missile.
					
					 Another twitter user wrote that it was sad to have taken the meteor as a bomb flown from north Korea and to have hurried the car in fear.
					
					 Lots of people were reported to have greatly worried about it, taking the meteor as an attack from north Korea.
					
					 A people said that it was greatly relieving that the meteor did not pass the sky last weekend when there was a misinformation about the flight of a nuclear bomb.
					
					 Japan NHK on websites on the afternoon of the same day carried a breaking news that "north Korea seems to have launched missile" only to apologize before its nationals later.
					
					 What was all the more irony was the fuss in Hawaii on January 13.
					
					 At 08:07 citizens and tourists on Hawaii received all at the same time the ballistic missile threat warning which urged them to evacuate as there was ballistic missile threat and which stressed that it was not just training.
					
					 The citizens and tourists in great disarray went busy evacuating amid the heightened fear and delusion of persecution about the nuclear force of the DPRK.
					
					 What is all the more ridiculous is that the U.S. Federal Communications Commission put it that the ballistic missile attack evacuation warning which threw the whole of Hawaii in a great chaos was caused by a mistake of a man who pressed the button during shift period.
					
					 The field repercussion is that it is quite natural that the whole state was thrown into fear as the citizens and tourists were fed the warning message as serious as the one warning of "imminent and actual drop of missile" which could be the most dreadful moment in life.
					
					 In recent days the U.S. forces in south Korea and their families were informed to leave south Korea by messages sent through hand phones or broadcasting means which made them get flurried in fear that a war may break out. In the U.S. people caught in extreme fear vied with each other to buy frozen foods, gas masks and goods for emergency use, indicative of the pain suffered by the Americans stricken by war-phobia.
					
					 The consecutive fuss in the U.S. and fear caused by even the natural phenomenon being mistaken as a rocket from the DPRK are the natural outcome of the acts done by the U.S. itself.

articles.title: Arrest of Lee Myung Bak Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Arrest of Lee Myung Bak Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo carried an editorial demanding the arrest of Lee Myung Bak on January 17.
					 The editorial stressed it is the steadfast will of the people to detain Lee and liquidate the evils.
					
					 If the "government" has a real intention to liquidate the evils it should arrest Lee at once, it said.
					
					 It warned that if Lee is not arrested and punished as early as possible the angry people's mindset against Lee would be naturally directed to the present "government".

articles.title: Distortion of Ferry Sewol Disaster Slashed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Distortion of Ferry Sewol Disaster Slashed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- The Taegu Citizens Measure Committee on the Ferry Sewol Disaster in south Korea reportedly denounced the conservatives' attempt to distort the truth behind the Ferry Sewol Disaster on Jan. 17.
					 A pro-Park Geun Hye body attempted to distort the truth of the ferry Sewol disaster by hanging out large suspension posters in street from Jan. 12, asserting that the disaster was planned on the north's instruction.
					
					 In this regard, the Taegu Citizens Measure Committee demanded that the conservative body bring the posters down.

articles.title: S. Korean Trade Union Demands Workers' Right to Existence
articles.content:
S. Korean Trade Union Demands Workers' Right to Existence
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- A Seoul-Inchon public service branch of the Public Transport Workers' Union of south Korea held a rally in front of Yonsei University on Jan. 17, demanding the recruit of workers and their right to existence, according to the south Korean paper Nodong and Segye.
					 Speakers at the rally said that the university where students are educated shouldn't cut down the wages of low-paid workers.
					
					 The conservative media are misleading the public opinion, blaming this crisis for the workers' struggle for hike of minimum wage but the university authorities are to blame as they are bleeding the workers white, they said.
					
					 They declared that they would struggle against the restructuring to the last.

articles.title: U.S. Imperialists Hit for Their Moves to Stifle DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Imperialists Hit for Their Moves to Stifle DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea reportedly held a rally outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Jan. 16 in denunciation of the U.S. imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK.
					 Speakers at the rally recalled that Trump's draft "nuclear posture review" the keynote of which is to develop the latest nuclear bomb was recently opened to the public, adding that the development is targeted against the north.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Held Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Russia
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un were held in the Czech Republic, Switzerland, Sweden, Austria, Spain and Egypt on Jan. 4-10.
					 The vice general secretary of the C.C., Czechoslovak Communist Party said that Kim Jong Un's New Year Address serves as guidelines clearly indicating the path for the Korean people this year and a banner instilling hope into the progressive people in the struggle for a just society.
					
					 The chief of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea expressed the will to intensify the campaign of supporting the just cause of the Korean people this year, too, saying that the orientation and ways for building a powerful socialist country, improving the north-south relations and reunifying the country were set forth in the New Year Address.
					
					 The chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association hoped that the Korean people would achieve greater victories in the struggle for the country's prosperity and accomplishment of the cause of national reunification in hearty response to Kim Jong Un's New Year Address this significant year marking the 70th birthday of the DPRK, a national auspicious event.
					
					 The chief of the Youth Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism formed in Austria and other speakers said that the Korean people won eye-opening successes in all fields despite all challenges of the U.S. and its vassal forces last year.
					
					 Personages of the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Spain and the Egyptian political parties and organizations explained the main contents of Kim Jong Un's New Year Address, stressing that the DPRK's nuclear weapons are formidable deterrent to the U.S. nuclear threat. They also referred to the tasks for the reunification of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar in the Czech Republic.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Backed in Mexico
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Backed in Mexico
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- The People's Socialist Party, National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Friend Association for Memory of President Kim Il Sung and Leader Kim Jong Il in Mexico and the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association made public a joint statement on Jan. 10 in support of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 Noting that the Korean people and the world's progressives have read his New Year Address with great excitement, the statement said:
					
					 We warmly congratulate the Korean people on having realized the great, historic cause of perfecting the national nuclear forces in the face of the imperialists' vicious anti-DPRK moves.
					
					 We are convinced that they will celebrate the 70th anniversary of the DPRK with splendor by making signal successes in the efforts to consolidate the independence and Juche character of the national economy and improve the people's standard of living.
					
					 We extend full support to the righteous proposals set forth by Comrade Kim Jong Un for the sake of improvement of inter-Korean relations and reunification of the country.
					
					 We flatly reject any attempt to disturb the peace of the Korean Peninsula, let alone joint military exercises.
					
					 We bitterly blast the UNSC "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK, a full-fledged member of the UN, as they only inflict pain on the Korean people.
					
					 We appeal to all progressive peoples around the world opposing the imperialists' high-handed and arbitrary practices and loving independence, peace and justice to extend support and solidarity to the Korean people in the heroic struggle for protecting the country's sovereignty and national right to existence.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Tanzania
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Tanzania
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- A Tanzanian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Dar es Salaam on Jan. 6.
					 Maina, vice-chairperson of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups, was elected chairperson of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il in the period from Jan. 6 to Feb. 16.

articles.title: Alcanza mas de 300 mil el numero de visitantes al Museo de Movimiento Juvenil
articles.content:
Alcanza mas de 300 mil el numero de visitantes al Museo de Movimiento Juvenil
Pyongyang, 19 de enero (ACNC) -- El 21 de enero del 105 (2016) de la Era Juche, fue inaugurado el Museo del Movimiento Juvenil con motivo del 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la Union de la Juventud Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista. 
					Durante dos anos desde entonces, lo visitaron mas de 300 mil militares, trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares de mas de 4 mil 100 entidades, entre ellos, los participantes en el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, la I Conferencia de los Presidentes de Comite de Base del Partido, el IX Congreso de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung y el VIII Congreso de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea, las unidades militares, la Casa de Creacion Mansudae, la Direccion de Construccion en el Extranjero y el Comite de la Union de la Juventud en la Provincia de Hwanghae del Norte. 
					
					En el hall general los visitantes rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il tras colocar ramos de flores ante las estatuas de pie de los grandes Lideres hallandose entre los jovenes y ninos.
					
					Luego, pasaron revista a las fotos de los grandes hombres sin iguales y a los datos y objetos exhibidos en cada sala. 
					
					Terminada la visita, manifestaron la decision de trabajar intensamente por el futuro de la potencia juvenil. 
					
					Los compatriotas en ultramar y los huespedes extranjeros expresaron sus impresiones de visita evaluando de muy prometedor el futuro de Corea con el gran contingente de jovenes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun insiste en aumentar poderio militar
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun insiste en aumentar poderio militar
Pyongyang, 19 de enero (ACNC) -- Hay que incrementar las fuerzas armadas para defender con firmeza la dignidad nacional, la felicidad del pueblo y la paz. 
					Adelanta el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual publicado este viernes y continua:
					
					El aumento del poderio militar no es un trabajo temporal sino el mas importante de los asuntos estatales. 
					
					Las fuerzas armadas, carentes de la ideologia y de la conciencia clasista y antiimperialista, rompen las conquistas de la revolucion obtenidas por los precursores y toman por su blanco de fuego a los habitantes levantados para defender su regimen. Este antecedente fue registrado no pocas veces en la historia.
					
					Si ellas no se basan en la independiente industria de defensa nacional, no podran defender hasta el final la dignidad nacional ni la felicidad del pueblo ni la paz. 
					
					Armar al ejercito con los armamentos que venden los paises desarrollados significa someterse al yugo militar. 
					
					A citar por ejemplo, algunos paises, reconocidos como potencias regionales y naciones ricas, se quedaron flojos en la capacidad militar ante la sancion de EE.UU. y otras potencias imperialistas y a la larga, han sido privados de la soberania nacional y sus habitantes inocentes sufrieron los desastres de guerra. 
					
					El ejercito y pueblo coreanos consolidaran la capacidad de autodefensa nacional manteniendo con firmeza la nueva linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares, presentada por el Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena ubicacion avanzada de fuerzas armadas de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena ubicacion avanzada de fuerzas armadas de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 19 de enero (ACNC) -- Hace unos dias, EE.UU. traslado 3 bombarderos Stealth "B-2" y casi 200 efectivos desde la base aerea del Estado Missouri a la de Anderson de la isla Guam describiendolo como "ubicacion rotativa rutinaria" y "de corto plazo".  
					 Esto es una excusa barata para enganar a la opinion publica interna y externa.
					
					  Asi senala el rotativo Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 19 y prosigue:
					
					  No es secreto que desde el principio de este ano, EE.UU. emplaza enormes fuerzas navales y aereas en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno.
					
					  Lo que llama la atencion es el despliegue de las fuerzas armadas que se encontraban en el territorio principal de EE.UU.
					
					  El emplazamiento doble y triple de las fuerzas armadas norteamericanas en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno forma parte de la aventura para tomar la hegemonia militar en la region de Asia-Pacifico mediante la "superioridad de fuerza" y atacar de manera preventiva a la RPDC con armas nucleares.
					
					  Si bien EE.UU. habla mucho de la paz, esto es una farsa para ocultar su atributo de agresor.
					
					  Ya paso para siempre el tiempo en que EE.UU. intentaba vulnerar a sus caprichos la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la seguridad regional sintiendose tranquilo por situarse lejos de la zona mas candente del mundo.
					
					  En la actualidad, el destino de EE.UU., que actua con arrogancia hablando atrevidamente de la "destruccion total" y el "exterminio" de un Estado soberano, esta sujeto a la decision de la RPDC, potencia nuclear del Juche y la militar de talla mundial.
					
					  EE.UU. debe dejar la ilusion de agredir al Norte de Corea, que le llevaria a la autodestruccion, escuchando con atencion la opinion del mundo de que la guerra de confrontacion nuclear RPDC-EE.UU. terminara en el mismo territorio norteamericano.

articles.title: Tragicomedia causada en EE.UU. por el temor a la guerra nuclear
articles.content:
Tragicomedia causada en EE.UU. por el temor a la guerra nuclear
Pyongyang, 19 de enero (ACNC) -- Escenifica una tragicomedia en Estados Unidos el panico a las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El pasado dia 16, cayo un aerolito sobre los Estados Ohio y Michigan.
					
					En los sitios web de EE.UU. se produjo el boom de articulos relativos al fenomeno meteorico.
					
					Los internautas reconocieron que tuvieron miedo a que el aerolito fuera una bomba nuclear lanzada por el Norte de Corea.
					
					Un usuario de Twitter escribio que "cuando el aerolito ilumino el cielo sobre los Estados Ohio y Michigan, todos los internautas desearon que eso no fuese el misil norcoreano".
					
					Muchas personas confundieron el meteorito con el misil expresando seria preocupacion por el ataque del Norte de Corea.
					
					Por la tarde del mismo dia, la cadena japonesa NHK divulgo en varios sitios web la informacion urgente senalando que "parece que el Norte de Corea ha disparado el misil" y luego, publico la version corregida en que pidio disculpas a la poblacion por el falso reporte.
					
					Lo que causa mas risas es el escandalo ocurrido el dia 13 en Hawai.
					
					A las 8 y 7 de la manana, se ha emitido simultaneamente a los habitantes locales y turistas la alerta de misil balistico que decia: "Tengan cuidado con el misil balistico. Busquen de inmediato los refugios. Esto no es un entrenamiento de evacuacion". 
					
					La alarma basto para dejar espantados a todos los moradores y turistas, puesto que llega al climax ahi el temor a las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC.
					
					Lo mas ridiculo vino despues cuando la Comision Federal de Comunicaciones publico que la emision de alarma fue un error de operacion del boton cometido por el hombre en servicio  durante el cambio de turnos.
					
					Recientemente, tan pronto como recibieran por via del celular y medios de prensa el aviso de evacuacion del Sur de Corea, las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del suelo surcoreano y sus familiares armaron alborotos para los preparativos de fuga. 
					
					Mientras tanto, los estadounidenses pesimistas y desesperados compran a porfias los alimentos congelados, caretas antigas y otros articulos de emergencia.
					
					Los hechos arriba mencionados significan una desgracia que se ha buscado EE.UU. por haber hostilizado tanto a la RPDC.
